findings.title:
Credential in plaintext?

Rule: CSCAN0220: DefaultPasswordContexts 4
Line:                     <password>root</password>

Commit: .
findings.description:
The application stores sensitive information in cleartext within a resource that might be accessible to another control sphere.

## Additional information

**[CSCAN0220: DefaultPasswordContexts 4](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/312.html)**

findings.title: Argument to implicit -n is always true due to literal strings.

Argument to implicit -n is always true due to literal strings.

details.name: Argument to implicit -n is always true due to literal strings.

findings.title: Iterating over ls output is fragile. Use globs.

Iterating over ls output is fragile. Use globs.
